Description: Section (reconstructed from fragments) of the body of a red pottery vessel (ostracon), the fabric is relatively coarse, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a red-brown slip and remains of at least six lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393501) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393501)
